title: How to get new icon?
body: So I did all that things but I still don't have icon on my profile. I actually only did it for Europe lcs..

replies.body: Hey Fost, we're doing icon granting at the end of each day (in each region). You should get your icon within 24 hours; have you not gotten it yet? Let me know, so I can follow up if needed.
Thank you man and thanks for support. I contacted support and they told me same. Today I woke up and icon was there. Thanks for responding in a day or so. Thanks for cooporation! Cheers, man!
